short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides stream times and links to Kpop music shows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides stream links and times to: 

SBS MTV The Show
MBC Show Champion
Mnet M! Countdown
Arirang Simply Kpop
KBS Music Bank
MBC Show! Music Core
SBS Inkigayo


Updates:
1.5 build - Fixed dead links and updated stream times
